original_text: Their calyxes and their branches were of one piece with it. The whole of it was a single piece of hammered work of pure gold.
korean_text: 이 꽃받침과 가지들을 줄기와 연결하여 전부를 순금으로 쳐서 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: Their calyxes and their branches were of one piece with it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 받침과 가지는 그것과 한 몸이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The whole of it was a single piece of hammered work of pure gold.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 전체는 순금으로 망치로 두드려 만든 하나의 조각이었습니다.
